textfsm_template:
Value HOSTNAME (\S+)
Value TYPE (\S+)
Value ADDRESS (\d+\.\d+\.\d+\.\d+)
Value TTL (\d+)

Start
  ^\s*Hostname\s+Type\s+Address\s+TTL\s*$$
  ^\s*${HOSTNAME}\s+${TYPE}\s+${ADDRESS}\s+${TTL}\s*$$ -> Record
